==== Ubuntu Women ====

* Launched http://twitter.com/ubuntuwomen and did a <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/archives/ubuntu-women/2011-June/003285.html|call for help]]</nowiki> with handling our social media outlets
* A team of volunteers was assembled to iron out bugs and check in changes for our theme: <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/archives/ubuntu-women/2011-June/003280.html|Wiki theme improvements]]</nowiki>
* Lyz ordered Ubuntu Women stickers from Vistaprint and shipped some to Cheri and Valorie for upcoming conferences: http://www.flickr.com/photos/pleia2/5883526968/
* Team meeting <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu-women.org/Meetings/20110609|June 9th]]</nowiki>
* Of the 672 Ubuntu Members at the end of this month 4.91% are women
